pages.text: Irish Setters were originally bred for hunting, specifically gamebirds.$(br2)Standing just over a block tall, these graceful dogs come in three different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in swamps and along ocean shores. They can also be found in some jungles, and more rarely along rivers.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Chicken Treat.
